## ViewMatrixNode class

View matrix input node

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ViewMatrixNode extends BaseGraphNode 
```
**Extends:** [BaseGraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.basegraphnode.md)

## Remarks

Provides the camera's view matrix (world space to view space transformation). This matrix transforms coordinates from world space to camera/view space, where the camera is at the origin looking down the negative Z axis.

The view matrix is the inverse of the camera's world transformation matrix.

Used for: - Custom lighting in view space - View-space normal calculations - Billboard effects - Custom camera-relative transformations

Output: - Output 1: 4x4 view matrix (mat4)

## Example


```typescript
const viewMatrix = new ViewMatrixNode();
const worldPos = new VertexPositionNode();

// Transform to view space
const transform = new TransformNode();
transform.connectInput(1, worldPos, 1);
transform.connectInput(2, viewMatrix, 1);
```
